basics.name: Nehal Nagaraj Shet
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: A passionate technology enthusiast and a software developer

work.name: Cloudera
work.summary: Designed, developed and contributed to various EngX tools and frameworks having an impact over various teams in the organization.
highlights: Administered and optimized Cloudera's internal CDP cluster deployer and scheduler framework, significantly improving efficiency and performance across the company's internal operations.

Designed and developed an internal tool that automates the triaging of failed runs, builds, processes, and workflows at scale. The tool analyzes over 10,000 logs daily, reducing manual failure analysis by 70%.
Developed CDP Assistant to answer internal queries and provide cluster details using CDP API and documentation, milvus db and llama3.
Enhanced the reliability and resilience of our internal services and infrastructure by leveraging StackStorm, Prometheus, and Grafana, achieving an 80% reduction in manual maintenance requirements.
Python, Go, Docker, Kubernetes, FastAPI, MongoDB, ElasticSearch, Platform9, Nifi, Spark, Hive, LLM

work.name: Morgan Stanley
work.summary: Optimized and migrated database and backend of an internal application from DB2 to MongoDB.

courses: DSA, OS, Programming, Database Design, Software Engineering, AI/ML, Computer Architecture, Networks, Compilers

projects.name: Optical Character Recognition and Text to Speech Converter
projects.summary: Collaborated with RVCE professors on a research project funded by the Dept. of Kannada and Culture, Govt. of Karnataka. Focused on regional language processing. Analyzed and developed a system for OCR and text to speech synthesis in Kannada.

projects.name: Human Recognition and Intrusion Detection System
projects.summary: Developed a project for ‘Fitness Konnect’ to recognize individuals and detect intrusions, utilizing the YOLOv4 model integrated with TensorFlow and OpenCV.

projects.name: Social Distancing Detector
projects.summary: Developed a system based on pre-trained MobileNet SSD and mathematical algorithms to monitor social distancing within RVCE campus settings, achieving an accuracy rate of 75%.

projects.name: Hostel Management System
projects.summary: A comprehensive hostel management system using MERN stack, facilitating seamless administration of hostel operations at RV College of Engineering.

projects.name: Spell Checker Tool
projects.summary: Developed a tool in C++ utilizing the edit distance algorithm and hash maps to identify misspelled words and suggest corrections, processing a file as input.

publications.name: Centralized Framework to Send Notifications from Multiple Tools and Services on Multiple Messaging Platforms
publications.publisher: International Journal For Research in Applied Science and Engineering Technology
publications.summary: This paper presents a generic notification framework that can be integrated with any kind of tools or services and will be able to send notifications on any messaging platform.

volunteer.summary: Volunteering employee engagement events at local schools and NGOs in Bengaluru, driving impactful initiatives.
Organized hackathons, coding competitions, workshops and technical sessions within the university. Provided mentorship to juniors, preparing them for campus placements.
Volunteered and contributed at several social events and NGOs by creating educational content, proposing solutions, conducting surveys and educating rural people and many more.
